item.title: All FragPunk Codes March 2025 - Free Gold, Pop Cans, Stickers, And More
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gamespot.com/articles/all-fragpunk-codes/1100-6530150/?ftag=CAD-01-10abi2f

GameSpot may receive revenue from affiliate and advertising partnerships for sharing this content and from purchases through links.

Coming from seemingly nowhere, Fragpunk has exploded onto the hero shooter scene with a bang. With its bright, cartoon-style artwork, interesting and immersive skillsets, and impressive character range, Fragpunk also has codes that you can use to redeem for free rewards in-game.

We've got a breakdown of all of the active codes in March 2025 as well as an explainer on how to redeem them:

Active Fragpunk codes

All of the new Fragpunk codes are:

  • ennawei0307 - 1,500 Gold, 10 Original Pop Cans, 1 Basic Sticker Pack
  • NIJIFRAGPUNK - 1,500 Gold, 10 Original Pop Cans, 1 Basic Sticker Pack
  • CHOWH1FP2025 - 1,500 Gold, 10 Original Pop Cans, 1 Basic Sticker Pack
  • FRAGPUNK2025 - 300 Gold, 168 Fragpunk Coins, 1 Wild Dawn Sticker Pack

Expired codes

Codes that were once active, but have now expired, include:

  • FRAGPUNKFPS - 1,500 Gold, 100 Lancer Skin Keys
  • BTRAFP2025 - 1,500 Gold, 10 Original Pop Cans, 1 Basic Sticker Pack
  • RECRENTFP2025 - 1,500 Gold, 10 Original Pop Cans, 1 Basic Sticker Pack
  • SHROUDFP2025 - 1,500 Gold, 10 Original Pop Cans, 1 Basic Sticker Pack
  • TENZFP2025 - 1,500 Gold, 10 Original Pop Cans, 1 Basic Sticker Pack
  • LOCKLEARFP2025 - 1,500 Gold, 10 Original Pop Cans, 1 Basic Sticker Pack
  • GOTAGAFP2025 - 1,500 Gold, 10 Original Pop Cans, 1 Basic Sticker Pack
  • FRAGPUNKFPS - 1,500 Gold, 100 Lancer Skin Keys

How to redeem Fragpunk codes

To redeem Fragpunk codes, follow these steps:

  • At the game's Home menu, press 'Esc'
  • Click 'Redemption Code'
  • Enter a code from above and hit 'Redeem'
  • After entering all of your codes, go back to the main menu
  • Press on the envelope icon to open your inbox
  • Press 'Claim All' to collect your rewards

Other Fragpunk freebies

There are other ways to get free items in Fragpunk besides redeeming codes. There are regular Twitch Drops events, where you can earn in-game rewards just from watching your favorite streamer playing the game on Twitch. There are in-game events, such as the Invite A Friend event, where giving a player under level 15 your invitation code will earn progress towards free Lancer skins.

In order to keep up with the current active Fragpunk codes, we'd recommend bookmarking this guide as we'll be regularly updating it to remove any expired codes and add new ones in. If you're new to the game, you can check out all of the Fragpunk Battle Pass tiers and rewards for Season 1.

Cheri Faulkner on Google+
